src:
Hasil Pertandingan PSS Sleman vs Bali United: 0-0
06 Nov 2019, 17:36 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Bali United gagal memetik kemenangan di pertandingan pekan ke-27 Shopee Liga 1 2019. Bertandang ke Stadion Maguwoharjo, Sleman, Tim berjuluk Serdadu Tridatu itu hanya mampu bermain imbang 0-0 melawan tuan rumah PSS Sleman.
Permainan antara PSS dan Bali United menarik sejak awal pertandingan. PSS Sleman membuka peluang pada menit keenam lewat tembakan Arif Satya Yudha Alkanza. Namun, Wawan Hendrawan masih mampu menghalau bola dengan baik.
Bali United berbalik menyerang untuk membuat peluang. Sebuah umpan matang Dias Angga kepada Ilija Spasojevic pada menit ke-10 sempat mengancam pertahanan PSS Sleman. Namun, pemain bertahan tim tuan rumah masih mampu mengamankan area mereka.
Berikutnya giliran Melvin Platje yang mengirimkan umpan silang kepada Stefano Lilipaly pada menit ke-14. Sayangnya, pemain naturalisasi itu masih sulit untuk memaksimalkan peluang yang didapatkannya di depan gawang PSS.
Bali United tetap mendominasi permainan dan lebih menyerang hingga menit-menit akhir babak pertama. Namun, PSS Sleman juga tak ingin berdiam diri. Melakukan strategi serangan balik, sebuah peluang didapatkan Kushedya Hari Yudo dua menit sebelum babak pertama usai. Namun, tembakannya masih mengarah ke sisi kanan gawang Bali United.
Hingga babak pertama usai, pertandingan antara PSS Sleman dan Bali United masih imbang tanpa gol.

Baca jalannya pertandingan di babak kedua di bawah ini.
text:
PSS Sleman vs Bali United Match Results: 0-0
Nov 6 2019, 17:36 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Bali United failed to win in the 27th match of Shopee Liga 1 2019. Visiting Maguwoharjo Stadium, Sleman, the team nicknamed Serdadu Tridatu was only able to play a 0-0 draw against host PSS Sleman.
The game between PSS and Bali United was interesting from the start of the match. PSS Sleman opened the opportunity in the sixth minute through Arif Satya Yudha Alkanza's shot. However, Henry Hendrawan is still able to clear the ball well.
Bali United turned to attack to make chances. A mature bait Dias Angga to Ilija Spasojevic in the 10th minute had threatened the PSS Sleman defense. However, the home side's defender is still able to secure their area.
Next was Melvin Platje's turn to send a cross to Stefano Lilipaly in the 14th minute. Unfortunately, the naturalized player is still difficult to maximize the opportunities he gets in front of the PSS goal.
Bali United continued to dominate the game and attack more until the final minutes of the first half. However, Sleman PSS also does not want to remain silent. Conducting a counter-attack strategy, an opportunity was obtained by Kushedya Hari Yudo two minutes before the first round ended. However, his shot was still directed towards the right side of the goal of Bali United.
Until the first half was over, the match between PSS Sleman and Bali United was still a goalless draw.

Read the game in the second half below.
